product_name: Serfas True 1000 USB Front Bike Light with Thunderbolt Rear Light
long_description: A super lightweight combo, the Serfas True 1000 Front Bike Light emits a bright 1,000 lumens and comes with a Thunderbolt Rear Light integrated in the battery pack. The Serfas True 1000 Front Bike Light offers a light weight of 80g thanks its CNC-machined aluminum construction; 1,000-lumen beam offers multiple settings. The 80g Thunderbolt Rear Light is integrated into the 140g battery case which can be strapped to the seatpost for maximum visibility or tucked under top tube. A USB outlet integrated into the battery pack can charge other accessories on the go. Running time for front light only: 120 min. in overdrive (1000 lumens); 3 hrs 10 min. on high (650 lumens); 4 hrs. 15 min. on medium (330 lumens); 10 hrs. 15 min. on flashing. Rear light has 2 flashing and 3 solid modes; brightness ranges from 10 - 35 lumens and running times range between 24 hrs. 25 min. (high solid) to 108 hrs. (low flash). Running time for front and rear light on: 2 hrs. 5 min. solid high; 17 hrs. 30 min. on low. Includes handlebar mount, helmet mount, remote switch for on-the-fly mode changes, extension cable, wall charger and storage case. Charge time with wall charger 4 hrs. Total weight of 300g (80g front light, 80g rear light and 140g battery case).
